column5: First few minutes there fishing for bait...then they get into the monsters, absolutely giant fish there dealing with.  Pretty cool vid, to bad they didn't catch any more.
His bait fish look bigger then most of fish i catch lol Set the hook and hold on for your dear life
Wow.... And I thought when I went fishing in Cape Cod for BLUEFISH/STRIPED BASS... that THOSE were a fight!! Maaaaaaaaaaaaaaan!! The fish I caught look like BAIT compared to those GOLIATH GROUPERS!!
HOLY FISH STICKS!!!! THAT GROUPER IS HUGE!!!!!!!
the fish (and their future business) would be so much better off if he just cut the hooks....no need to drag it up on the boat.
